ProhibitedActivities.Details: You may not use Jarvis AI for any malicious activities, including but not limited to hacking, spamming, or spreading malware. You may not abuse or harass Jarvis AI or other users. Any unauthorized use of Jarvis AI is strictly prohibited.

ModificationOfTerms.Details: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time without prior notice. Any changes will be effective immediately upon posting. Your continued use of Jarvis AI after the changes constitutes acceptance of the modified Terms.

GoverningLaw.Title: Governing Law
GoverningLaw.Details: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of [Your Jurisdiction]. Any disputes arising out of or relating to these Terms shall be resolved exclusively in the courts of [Your Jurisdiction].

Contact.Title: Contact Us
